instructions:
In a large bowl combine all above except fine dry bread crumbs. Shape into 6 cakes. Roll each cake in
dry bread crumbs and refrigerate for 2 hours. Fry over low heat in melted butter in large skillet for 4 minutes
on first side then 3 minutes on second side or until brown. May be frozen after frying. Reheat frozen crab
cakes on a cookie sheet in a 400 F oven for 15 minutes.
ingredients: 1/2 lb crab meat (backfin or lump), picked over
name: Maryland Crab Cakes
